page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The NTS are the main employer on the island. They employ estate workers on the farm, a handyman for maintenance of properties and a NTS representative to look after visitors to the island. They are also running an Oyster Farm pilot scheme. The other 2 main employers are the Education Authority who employ a teacher and the Post Office. (see next page for employment chart.) There are other part time jobs such as telephone engineer, auxilary coast guards, pier master, B&B, lobster fishing and collecting winkles by which islanders supplement their income. Some islanders have crofts and therefore can also supplement their income by the sale of sheep and cattle.
